Essential Nature.quote: That which is supreme, ultimate, and beyond all attributes yet containing all possibilities. (Vedanta Sutra 1.1.2)

Transcendent Aspect.quote: Beyond name and form, beyond time and space, beyond all that is and is not. (Mandukya Upanishad)

Immanent Presence.quote: Closer to you than your jugular vein. (Quran 50:16)

Universal Consciousness.quote: The one consciousness that illumines all experiences. (Yoga Vasistha 2.16)

Infinite Being.quote: Infinite and eternal, without beginning or end, the source of all existence. (Bhagavad Gita 10:3)

Ultimate Truth.quote: The way and the truth and the life. (John 14:6)

Supreme Identity.quote: Neither this nor that, yet both and beyond - neti neti. (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 2.3.6)

Absolute Existence.quote: The ground of being itself. (Paul Tillich, Systematic Theology)

Divine Essence.quote: The essence of all essences, the reality of all realities. (Ibn Arabi, Fusus al-Hikam)

Primordial Source.quote: From which all beings arise and to which all return. (Tao Te Ching 16)

Ultimate Principle.quote: The principle of all principles, the light of all lights. (Kena Upanishad 1.3)

Supreme Intelligence.quote: The cosmic intelligence that orders all things. (Heraclitus, Fragment 41)

Absolute Freedom.quote: Perfect freedom beyond all bondage and limitation. (Ashtavakra Gita 1:10)

Divine Unity.quote: The One without a second. (Chandogya Upanishad 6.2.1)

Universal Spirit.quote: The spirit that pervades all existence. (Bhagavad Gita 13:14)

Supreme Power.quote: The power behind all powers, the force behind all forces. (Zohar 2:42b)

Eternal Being.quote: That which always was, is, and shall be. (Revelation 1:8)

Ultimate Reality.quote: The reality that underlies all appearances. (Lankavatara Sutra)

Supreme Love.quote: The source of all love and compassion. (1 John 4:16)

Absolute Knowledge.quote: The knower of all that is knowable. (Mundaka Upanishad 1.1.9)

Divine Presence.quote: The omnipresent reality in which we live and move and have our being. (Acts 17:28)

Supreme Will.quote: The will that manifests all possibilities. (Ibn Arabi, Fusus al-Hikam)

Ultimate Purpose.quote: The alpha and omega, the purpose of all purposes. (Revelation 22:13)

Divine Harmony.quote: The supreme harmony that maintains the cosmic order. (Tao Te Ching 42)

Absolute Peace.quote: The peace that passes all understanding. (Philippians 4:7)

Supreme Good.quote: The highest good from which all good derives. (Plato, Republic)

Divine Law.quote: The eternal law that governs all existence. (Aquinas, Summa Theologica I-II.91.1)

Ultimate Mystery.quote: The mystery of mysteries, the gate to all wonders. (Tao Te Ching 1)
